page.title: 04Liverpool Newsham,Employment
page.content: All schools in this area repoted an increase in employment amongst parents and older brothers and sisters. Old Swan Job Centre gave the following figures to the children of Broadgreen Jnrs: 23% of the work force are unemployed. 62% of school leavers go into paid work,much of this is in YTS. They also said that despite the Wavertree Science Park future prospects are not good. St. Sebastians School found that 29% of their fathers were unemployed and 53% of mothers work full or part time. This was perhaps due to male employment and low wage levels. Birchfield School found that 34% of fathers are unemployed. Of those employed lorry drivers and building trade workers were most numerous.
